description: Try our easy to follow Truss Cherry Tomato Tart recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Truss Cherry Tomato Tart Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 150g chunky basil with cashews and parmesan dip

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Place a baking tray into oven.

Process flour and butter in a food processor until mixture resembles fine breadcrumbs. Add 1 egg and 1 tbs cold water and process until mixture just comes together. Turn out onto a lightly floured board and knead until mixture comes together. Form into a disc, wrap in plastic and chill for 20 minutes.

Roll pastry out between two sheets of baking paper until approximately 35cm in diameter. Spread dip over pastry, leaving a 5cm border around the edge. Snip tomatoes from vine, leaving green stalk attached. Arrange tomatoes over tart. Fold edges in towards centre. Whisk remaining egg and brush over pastry. Sprinkle with sea salt flakes and black pepper.
Remove hot tray from oven and slide tart onto tray. Bake for 30-35 minutes or until pastry is golden and cooked through. Serve.
